item.title: ‘This is the Cuban Missile Crisis in space’: Russia is building a space nuke that could wipe out every satellite in orbit, U.S. warns
item.description: “If this anti-satellite nuclear weapon would be put in space, it would be the end of the space age,” Rep. Mike Turner said.

item.title: Target and Ulta just broke up: Employees raised red flags about shoplifting, understaffing, and foot-traffic cannibalization
